title: lucasjansen1980
author: lucasjansen1980
created_time: November 21, 2022, 12:41:32 PMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 10:54:03 AM by lucasjansen1980
content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin Dear CORE Community, Following our recent achievements, we are proud to announce a new event within our schedule; CMCX TOKEN BURN EVENTCORE Committee has decided to burn a considerable portion of the circulating supply prior to the CORE MultiChain’s Mainnet (Origo) Launch in order to help the growth of the project.  CORE MultiChain’s CMCX token burning event will take place in THREE phases:Phase1️⃣: Second week of November 2022;Phase2️⃣: First week of December 2022;Phase3️⃣: Fourth week of December 2022. IMPORTANT NOTE: The burning tokens will be from the UNSOLD circulating tokens.Stay Tuned for more surprising news in the coming weeks! Follow the links below to get more info:Website: https://www.coremultichain.comDejaVu Test-net: https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.comCORE Paper: https://coremultichain.com/docs/core-paper.pdfTwitter: https://twitter.com/COREMultichainTelegram channel: https://t.me/coremultichainTelegram group: https://t.me/coremultichaingroupCoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/core-multichainYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/coremultichainGitHub: https://github.com/COREMultichainWallet: https://wallet.coremultichain.comStaking: https://dapp.coremultichain.comCertik: https://www.certik.com/projects/coremultichainInstagram: http://instagram.com/coremultichainMedium: https://coremultichain.medium.comGrowth: https://growth.coremultichain.comRoadmap: https://coremultichain.com/roadmapTechnology: https://coremultichain.com/technologyCORE Ecosystem: https://coremultichain.com/ecosystem#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CORE #CMCX #COREMultiChain

comments.body: The CORE team is proud to announce that the First phase of the CMCX token burning have been successfully done.An amount of 700,000,000 CMCX tokens have been burned in this phase in this transaction:https://etherscan.io/tx/0xb53e5fbeee9f0a900eaa2f6d93f6d4a4641f891079ac06b6f1347cd8dc6345ec#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin

comments.author: Ive Gone Parabolic
comments.body: There is a necessity to announce an LP pair: LUNC-CMCX. When CMCX is burned, the burned coins should automatically buy LUNC through the LP and this way prune it out of circulation. LUNC would be burned this way as part of CMCX burn. When LUNC is burned it should swap for CMCX with the exact purpose of burning CMCX as part of bipartisan effort to burn coins on both chains when either is burned.
